content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Beam® Shaped Fiberoptic Handpieces are a cost effective solution to guide laser fibers during orthopedic surgery, general surgery, neurosurgery, ENT, and oral surgery. They come in 45° angle, offset, curved, and spatula tip configurations. The handpieces are re-usable, sterilizable, and come in a variety of sizes.

  • Come in a variety of rigid, pre-configured shapes
  • Fit almost any laser fiber
  • Sterilizable, less waste than disposable handpieces
  • Available in lengths from 2.5cm to 50cm
  • Available in widths from 11ga to 16ga

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72599″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574446376220{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Shaped Handpieces

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Save money by purchasing quality, re-usable Fiberoptic Handpieces instead of disposable. Accu-Beam® Shaped Fiberoptic Handpieces are reliable, cost-effective, and autoclavable for sterilization. The pre-configured options come in 45° angle, offset, curved, and spatula tip.

These handpieces are compatible with almost any laser fiber and are available in several gauges to accommodate different widths. Varying lengths allow for the perfect handpiece no matter the procedure or patient.

Various part numbers[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d5487e3-8eb3″][vc_column_text]Compatible with most laser fibers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d87e3-8eb3″][vc_column_text]Fiberoptic Handpieces are class 2 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a87e3-8eb3″][vc_column_text] All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
